remarks: Compatibility of the group operation with the free group equivalence relation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Oct-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Feb-2016.)
statement:
frgpval.m $e |- G = ( freeGrp ` I ) $.
frgpval.b $e |- M = ( freeMnd ` ( I X. 2o ) ) $.
frgpval.r $e |- .~ = ( ~FG ` I ) $.
frgpcpbl.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` M ) $.
frgpcpbl $p |- ( ( A .~ C /\ B .~ D ) -> ( A .+ B ) .~ ( C .+ D ) ) $.
